# tune

<!-- badges: start -->
[![Lifecycle: experimental](https://img.shields.io/badge/lifecycle-experimental-orange.svg)](https://www.tidyverse.org/lifecycle/#experimental)
[![CRAN status](https://www.r-pkg.org/badges/version/tune)](https://CRAN.R-project.org/package=tune)
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of tune is to faciltate the tuning of hyperparameters the tidymodels packages. 

## Installation

You can install the released version of tune from [CRAN](https://CRAN.R-project.org) with:

``` r
install.packages("tune")
```
